author: BigLibSB
title: US mass shootings prompt surge in weapons sales
text: US mass shootings prompt surge in weapons sales User Name Current Events Current Events Forum - Latest political news and events 3 Thanks Talent on loan from god Cowardice is an orphan. Stupid is a dead orphan... There was no time for you to read the article trollboy...empty barrels sure make the most noise...you are trolling 24/7...they should cut your food stamps and SSI... Location: The Front Line. Posts: 353 Yep, every time a mass shooting happens, or a Dem gets elected to office, scared little morons across the country start buying up guns and ammo. Better make sure you take care when burying them in the back yard. Wouldn't want them to get ruined. Whatever. I can't imagine going through life being so scared of nothing. Talent on loan from god Quote: Originally Posted by Lyzza Yep, every time a mass shooting happens, or a Dem gets elected to office, scared little morons across the country start buying up guns and ammo. Better make sure you take care when burying them in the back yard. Wouldn't want them to get ruined. Whatever. I can't imagine going through life being so scared of nothing. I've said that many times. Fear is such a weak and pathetic emotion. The irony here is that the same people that demanded the right to totally proliferate are society with guns also seem to be the same ones that fear the results of their own handiwork the most. Talk about creating your own self fulfilling prophecy.
